about_the_game:
Gravity UP is a single-player adventure that not only offers captivating and diverse scenarios but also represents one of the toughest challenges in the gaming landscape. This title is designed to test your skills like never before, and only the most determined and skilled players will manage to complete it.

Visual Style
Gravity UP boasts a distinctive and creative visual style, featuring medieval, surreal, zoological, and fantastical environments with giant mushrooms. The graphics combine vivid colors and unique details to create immersive and enchanting worlds. Smooth animations and gravity effects enhance the complexity and beauty of each environment, while the game's high difficulty demands impeccable precision and strategy.

Environments
Medieval Kingdom:

Theme: Majestic castles, towers, and stone labyrinths.
Mechanics: Gravity interacts with classic architectural structures, creating puzzles that require deep reflection and strategic planning.
Obstacles: Complex traps and medieval-themed challenges.
Surreal Dimension:

Theme: Bizarre, dreamlike environments where reality seems distorted and the laws of physics are inverted.
Mechanics: Psychedelic landscapes and impossible architectures require creative thinking and innovative solutions to navigate increasingly complex puzzles.
Zoolandia:

Theme: An animal-inspired world with habitats combining unique gravity mechanics.
Mechanics: Suspended cages and floating water tanks present challenges that involve managing natural elements and animal behaviors.
Obstacles: Intricate puzzles and demanding obstacles.
Mushroom Forest:

Theme: An enchanted forest filled with giant mushrooms and fantastical landscapes.
Mechanics: Mushrooms create unique gravity mechanics and obstacles. Players must interact with these natural elements to solve complex puzzles and face difficult challenges.
Difficulty
Gravity UP is designed to be an extreme test of skill and patience. Its difficulty is calibrated to challenge even the most experienced players, and only those with a combination of dexterity, strategy, and perseverance will succeed. The puzzles are intricate, and the challenges intensify progressively, ensuring that the journey to complete the game is both demanding and rewarding. Prepare to face obstacles that require millimeter-perfect precision and deep reflection—few will reach the end.

name: Gravity UP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Richiede un processore e un sistema operativo a 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
